revised_title: Effects of Intense Heat and Climate on Health in Bengal
tldr: This letter from Fleming Martin, a chief engineer in Bengal, describes the extreme heat and its effects on the climate and health of the region. The intense heat caused temperatures to rise, leading to a high mortality rate and various health issues. The letter also discusses the unhealthy season, when salt petre in the air causes sickness, and the challenges of living in such a hot climate.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Climate and Weather
